post:
Dear All,

[GigsGigsCloud](http://www.gigsgigscloud.com) is division of[ GigsGigs.com](http://www.gigsgigs.com) for Cloud Focus Solutions. 

[URL="http://www.gigsgigscloud.com"]GigsGigsCloud[/URL] is launching new VPS Plan, Cloudlet B, price start from $2/month.

**Cloudlet B1 **
-  1 Core Processor
- 512M Memory
- 30G SAS Disk Storage
- 500G Data Transfer
- Monthly Fees : $2 /month
- Yearly fees : $18 / year 

[View More](http://www.gigsgigscloud.com/cloud-vps-hosting/)

**Cloudlet B2 **
- 2 Core Processor
- 1024M Memory
- 60G SAS Disk Storage
- 1500 G Data Transfer
- Monthly Fees : $4 /month
- Yearly fees : $38 / year 

[View More](http://www.gigsgigscloud.com/cloud-vps-hosting/)
